name: Scrambled Eggs with CCB
description: Enjoy for breakfast, lunch or dinner!
preparation: In a mixing bowl, whisk eggs, milk and CCB Dip Mix. Stir in cheese.
In a large frying pan melt butter over medium heat. Add eggs to pan.

As mixture begins to set, gently move a Corner Spatula across the bottom and sides of pan to form large, moist “curds.” Cook until eggs are done, but still moist. Season with Black Pepper and Sea Salt.
tips: Serve on a bagel or English muffin, inside a warm croissant, or with Cheddar Herb & Garlic Biscuits.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.
